item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Hello, Namastey!

Spreading Knowledge, Sharing Happiness

Fascinated by the ancient art of Vedic Kundli, I started learning Vedic astrology 5 years ago to discover how wonderful, accurate, and excellent explorers our sages were, who calculated and predicted our lives based on planetary positions up there in the sky and their deep impacts on our lives.

In my journey of learning, I would like to share the knowledge I have gained, as and when I can, and spread this ancient art.

I would also love to help people in whatever small ways I could—whether by providing astrology analysis or by being a friend, a listener, a support, or a coach to help them face the challenges that life brings. I want to share happiness and help bring smiles to people’s faces.

Life is a journey filled with ups and downs, and I believe that with a little guidance and support, we can all find our way to peace and joy. Let’s walk this path together, hand in hand, and create a brighter tomorrow.

With warmth and gratitude

Ashwini

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

I am a passionate freelance writer with a deep love for storytelling and a happy, optimistic outlook on life. My work is driven by a desire to connect with people, share meaningful narratives, and inspire positive change. I believe in the power of words to heal, uplift, and transform lives, and I strive to use my writing to make a difference in the world.

Beyond my professional pursuits, I am deeply committed to helping society rise above its challenges and sorrows. Whether through my writing or personal efforts, I aim to contribute to creating a more compassionate and empowered community.

In addition to my writing, I am an avid learner of the ancient Indian art of interpreting Janma Kundli (Vedic astrology charts). This fascinating practice has not only enriched my understanding of life’s complexities but also deepened my appreciation for the interconnectedness of all things.

With a curious mind and a heart full of gratitude, I continue to explore new horizons, embrace learning opportunities, and spread positivity wherever I go. Life, to me, is a beautiful journey of growth, connection, and service.
